flawed_nl_solution:
The area of the largest room is 45 ft x 30 ft = <<45*30=1530>>1530 sq ft
The area of the smallest room is 15 ft x 8 ft = <<15*8=120>>120 sq ft
The difference between the two is 1530 sq ft - 120 sq ft = <<1530-120=1410>>1410 sq ft
#### 1410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1350, not 1530. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
